title: Refactor useNavigationHistory hook to dual-pointer model
description:
Replace current LIFO stack with NavigationState { stack: NoteId[], currentIndex: number }. Implement:
- navigateToNote(): truncates forward history, pushes new note, handles FIFO eviction at 1000 items
- navigateBack(): decrements currentIndex, loads previous note
- navigateForward(): increments currentIndex, loads next note  
- removeFromHistory(): removes deleted note from stack, adjusts currentIndex
- canGoBack/canGoForward computed from currentIndex position
- No-op when navigating to current note
Remove clearHistory() - it will be deleted from the API.

title: Unit tests for useNavigationHistory dual-pointer model
description:
Write comprehensive unit tests in useNavigationHistory.test.ts:
- Initial state: canGoBack=false, canGoForward=false
- Single navigation: stack=[A], currentIndex=0
- Multiple navigations: A->B->C results in stack=[A,B,C], currentIndex=2
- Navigate back: decrements index, canGoForward becomes true
- Navigate forward: increments index
- Navigate after back (branch): truncates forward history, stack=[A,B,D]
- Duplicate navigation: no-op, state unchanged
- Max history (1000): first item removed on overflow, index adjusted
- Remove from history: stack adjusted, index corrected for removed items
- Remove current note: navigates to adjacent note

title: Create NavigationButtons component
description:
Create new NavigationButtons component in components/NavigationButtons/:
- NavigationButtons.tsx: Two buttons (back/forward) side by side
- Props: canGoBack, canGoForward, onBack, onForward
- Use Button from design-system with variant='ghost', tone='neutral', size='sm'
- ArrowLeftIcon for back, ArrowRightIcon for forward
- disabled prop when can't navigate
- aria-label for accessibility ('Go back to previous note', 'Go forward to next note')
- title with keyboard hints ('Go back (Cmd+[)', 'Go forward (Cmd+])')
- NavigationButtons.css.ts: container styles (position fixed, top 48px, left 16px, z-index 100, gap 4px)
- Disabled state: opacity 0.3, cursor not-allowed
- index.ts: export component

title: Component tests for NavigationButtons
description:
Write component tests in NavigationButtons.test.tsx:
- Both disabled: canGoBack=false, canGoForward=false - both buttons have disabled styling
- Back enabled only: canGoBack=true, canGoForward=false - back enabled, forward disabled
- Forward enabled only: canGoBack=false, canGoForward=true - back disabled, forward enabled
- Both enabled: canGoBack=true, canGoForward=true - both buttons enabled
- Back click: clicking back button calls onBack
- Forward click: clicking forward button calls onForward
- Disabled back click: clicking disabled back button does NOT call onBack
- Disabled forward click: clicking disabled forward button does NOT call onForward
- Accessibility: verify aria-labels and titles are present

title: Remove clearHistory() calls from App.tsx
description:
Remove all calls to clearHistory() from App.tsx. Per the new design:
- All navigation actions (sidebar, command palette, wiki-links, context panel, backlinks) push onto the history stack
- No navigation should clear the history anymore
- Remove any logic that calls clearHistory() when opening notes via command palette or creating new notes

title: Wire removeFromHistory to note deletion
description:
Connect removeFromHistory() to note deletion flow in App.tsx:
- When a note is deleted, call removeFromHistory(deletedNoteId)
- This removes all occurrences of the deleted note from the history stack
- If the deleted note was the current note, the hook will handle navigation to adjacent note
- Ensure this integrates with existing delete note flow
